text: يَـٰمَرْيَمُ ٱقْنُتِى لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسْجُدِى وَٱرْكَعِى مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

translation.en.sahih: O Mary, be devoutly obedient to your Lord and prostrate and bow with those who bow [in prayer]."
translation.id.indonesian: Hai Maryam, taatlah kepada Tuhanmu, sujud dan ruku'lah bersama orang-orang yang ruku'.
